com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes

Class BinIndexQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.api.RiakCommand<S,U>
      • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes.SecondaryIndexQuery<String,BinIndexQuery.Response,BinIndexQuery>
        • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes.BinIndexQuery

  • public class BinIndexQuery
extends SecondaryIndexQuery<String,BinIndexQuery.Response,BinIndexQuery>
    Performs a 2i query where the 2i index keys are strings.

    A RawIndexQuery is used when you are using strings for your 2i keys. The parameters are provided as String objects. 

     Namespace ns = new Namespace("my_type", "my_bucket");
 String key = "some_key";
 BinIndexQuery q = new BinIndexQuery.Builder(ns, "my_index", key).build();
 BinIndexQuery.Response resp = client.execute(q);
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Brian Roach
